title: Hatchy
author: Hatchy
created_time: May 14, 2023, 01:07:06 PMLast edit: May 14, 2023, 02:19:33 PM by Hatchy
content: Well it's a happy Sunday to everyone here on our amazing forum, so I decided to put a smile on our faces today. Check out these cool memes and tell me which one hits the most[center][/center]You can equally drop yours, if you gat some Please if this topic is a shit post and don't fits here please moderators should delete it. sorry if I offended anyone.

comments.author: Bureau
comments.body: I don't think this topic is relevant to the Meta board. It would be wise if you shift it to the Bitcoin Discussion board. If you are not familiar on how to do move a topic then please read this thread:  How to Correct Move Topic

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: Bureau on May 14, 2023, 01:13:16 PMI don't think this topic is relevant to the Meta board.Definitely inappropriate for this board, and besides there is at least one main meme topic that unfortunately turned into an invalid image message.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5232907.0Quote from: Bureau on May 14, 2023, 01:13:16 PMIt would be wise if you shift it to the Bitcoin Discussion board. Why do you think it would be a suitable board? It is true that there is too much garbage there and that I counted over 60 topics that I would have otherwise reported as "low quality topic" or "posted in wrong board", but I read that artificial intelligence will do that job, although as far as I can see spam is flourishing in the respective board.In my opinion, this topic has only two possible options - the first is to move it to Off-topic, and the second is to delete it.

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: Not sure if this board is even correct for posting memes lol however let it be, but the memes are not funny at all.Low-quality meme which you literally copied from images.google.com. If you made some effort to find the good ones, maybe I would have laughed and given merit too.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Sorry OP, those memes are barely even average.Quote from: Lucius on May 14, 2023, 01:45:18 PMDefinitely inappropriate for this board, and besides there is at least one main meme topic that unfortunately turned into an invalid image message.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5232907.0Pretty weird — probably the first instance where I found out that imgur deleted some older photos.Archive.org backup: https://web.archive.org/web/20200502164327/https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5232907.msg54030831#msg54030831

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: The title reads "Bitcoin memes" and yet I can see bitcointalk memes, you should edit the title from "Bitcoin memes" to "Bitcoin/Bitcointalk memes".Secondly, please do well to reduce the size of your images, it's taking forever to load here on my end. If you reduce the size it will make it faster to load.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: I am extremely sorry but your memes aren't making me laugh. However, you have tried to create some memes and that's a good step towards such kind of art. You'll definitely learn some tactics soon so that you can create memes that will really worth the time.Like others, I'm also not sure that if Bitcoin Discussion is the right board for such topics because here mostly topics that are directly connected to Bitcoin or are highly related it are posted most frequently. I think in this case a senior member might guide you well. Still I appreciate your efforts for creating those memes, keep it up my friend soon you'll be able to create good memes. Best of luck!

comments.author: raybucks
comments.body: Quote from: bitnote on October 25, 2023, 04:15:42 AMnice, I quoted for you.

comments.author: ineedhelpplease
comments.body: Quote from: JoseBowman on January 13, 2024, 10:00:31 PMBitcoin has become a popular subject for memes due to its prominence in the world of cryptocurrency. Here are a few common themes and examples of Bitcoin memes:"HODL": The term "HODL" originated from a typo in a Bitcoin forum post, where the word "hold" was misspelled. It has since become a rallying cry for Bitcoin holders, meaning to hold onto Bitcoin regardless of market fluctuations. Memes often depict characters or images with captions like "HODL on tight" or "HODL gang.""When Lambo?": This meme refers to the idea that people invest in Bitcoin to make significant profits and eventually afford luxury items like Lamborghini cars. Memes often show a person asking, "When Lambo?" as a symbol of the desire for financial success."Bitcoin Roller Coaster": Bitcoin's price volatility has been a constant source of amusement for meme creators. Memes portray the fluctuating price of Bitcoin as a roller coaster ride, with images of people screaming or holding on for dear life as the price goes up and down."Bitcoin vs. Traditional Banking": Memes often contrast the decentralized nature of Bitcoin with the centralized control of traditional banking systems. They may depict Bitcoin as a superhero fighting against a traditional bank or portray traditional banks as outdated and inefficient."Mooning": The term "to the moon" is used to express the belief that Bitcoin's price will skyrocket. Memes often show rockets or astronauts with Bitcoin logos, symbolizing the hope for significant price increases."Scam Coins": Memes may satirize the numerous altcoins and initial coin offerings (ICOs) by depicting them as ridiculous or fraudulent projects. These memes playfully highlight the skepticism and caution around investing in lesser-known cryptocurrencies.Remember that memes can be humorous and entertaining, but they often simplify complex topics and may not always reflect the nuances of the cryptocurrency market. It's important to conduct thorough research and exercise caution when making financial decisions related to Bitcoin or any other cryptocurrencies.You are definitely making AI posts lol..

comments.author: Ravichnadra
comments.body: Well, can someone tell me how to post a meme image here.I have been finding it difficult to do so.BTW i love the memes

comments.author: rodskee
comments.body: Quote from: Ravichnadra on January 16, 2024, 07:02:13 AMWell, can someone tell me how to post a meme image here.I have been finding it difficult to do so.BTW i love the memes You need to use this instead https://www.talkimg.com/because Imgur had been banned from the forum so better use talkimg to post your photos.Just check OP's post and follow how she uses the img site to put those photos here so be guided with that mate.will love seeing your images sharing here .

comments.author: Ravichnadra
comments.body: Quote from: rodskee on January 16, 2024, 09:03:18 AMQuote from: Ravichnadra on January 16, 2024, 07:02:13 AMWell, can someone tell me how to post a meme image here.I have been finding it difficult to do so.BTW i love the memes You need to use this instead https://www.talkimg.com/because Imgur had been banned from the forum so better use talkimg to post your photos.Just check OP's post and follow how she uses the img site to put those photos here so be guided with that mate.will love seeing your images sharing here .Well - Thank you so much for the information. Would definitely love to post some here. Thanks again mate.

comments.author: cute nmp
comments.body: Have come across a lot of crypto memes some are really funny ,Think most of those meme get very viral during the bearish market cant say i missed the bearish market but sure I really do missed the funny memes.

comments.author: Medusah
comments.body: People make fun of Laszlo for paying 10000 bitcoin for two pizzas, but the real ones to make fun of are those who knew about bitcoin since 2010 and lacked the courage to hold it.  Laszlo may be a secret millionaire as we speak.

comments.author: Uhwuchukwu53
comments.body: Quote from: Hatchy on May 14, 2023, 01:07:06 PMWell it's a happy Sunday to everyone here on our amazing forum, so I decided to put a smile on our faces today. Check out these cool memes and tell me which one hits the most[center][/center]You can equally drop yours, if you gat some Please if this topic is a shit post and don't fits here please moderators should delete it. sorry if I offended anyone.Making meme or morcry of laszlo who uses his Bitcoin to eat pizza I will not blame him, because may not know his condition at that point regards to hunger. Hunger is one of the hardest enemy of mankind it can make you act like a child when it hold you beyond control where you begin to experience stomach bite. I can only see him Jacob elder brother called isu who sold his birth right to his younger brother due to hunger, he sold his future in place of hunger but is who is alive that have future.
